name: df-gex
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cgex, cmpt(s0, universe, csb(s3, crab(s1, cn, wral(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cmg, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, cv(s0))))), cif(nat0, cinf(cv(s3), cr, clt), wceq(cv(s3), emptycls)))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ gEx =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶[{ s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0),(s1[(.g ` s0)]s2)=(0 ` s0))} / s3]if(s3 = ‚àÖ, 0, inf(s3, ‚Ñù, <)))
comment: Define the exponent of a group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Sep-2015.) (Revised by AV, 26-Sep-2020.)
